DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate acupuncture 's effect prevent vasospasm SAH . A total 80 participant recruit randomized study group control group . Acupuncture , electroacupuncture intradermal acupuncture do every session study group , mock transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation ( mock TENS ) sham intradermal acupuncture carry control group .
DOC.brief_title: Acupuncture Cerebral Vasospasm After Subarachnoid Hemorrhage
DOC.detailed_description: Intervention start within 96hours SAH , rupture aneurysms secure endovascular coil surgical clipping . Intervention apply day , 6 day week 2 week ( total 12 session ) addition standard treatment prophylactic HHH therapy nimodipine . Sterile disposable , stainless steel acupuncture needle use . Primary outcome measurement occurrence delay ischemic neurological deficit study group control group . Moreover , incidence angiographic vasospasm , TCD vasospasm , vasospasm-related infarct CT MRI , change nitric oxide ( NO ) endothelin-1 plasma , mortality participant 's functional status use mRS compare .
DOC.criteria: Participants conform follow condition include : 1 ) SAH verify CT cerebral angiography ; 2 ) aneurysm treat endovascular coil surgical clipping ; 3 ) age > 18 year ; 4 ) HHS 14 ; 5 ) acupuncture treatment start within 96 hour SAH ; 6 ) participation voluntarily inform consent sign . Healthy control matched patient gender age Participants follow condition exclude : 1 ) traumatic infectious SAH ; 2 ) HHS 5 ; 3 ) Transcranial Doppler ( TCD ) perform ; 4 ) heart , liver renal failure ; 5 ) presence cardiac pacemaker .
